prompts: Create a flying-type Pokemon with striking feathers and a confident demeanor.
I want a bird Pokemon that has a majestic wingspan and colorful plumage.
Generate a Pokemon resembling a large, elegant bird soaring through the skies.
Make a vibrant Pokemon with a sleek body design and a playful personality.
Imagine a powerful bird Pokemon that commands the skies with its impressive flight.
Design a graceful flying Pokemon that embodies freedom and agility in its movements.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like a regal bird with a unique color palette.
